name: TOTEM.S
description:
This a game about two friends. It's kind of a rage game. It's really hard. For now it only has 3 levels. I might add more in the future :]. 

Hope you like my puzzle game :D

Also, don't take the death screen guy seriously, he is just messing around with ya.

And remember the THE BIG TRANSPARENT WINKIE FACE IS THE RESTART BUTTON.  ;)
